reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel with husband and 2 young children aged 2 and 5. As I requested we were given a room on a higher floor with a view. We had a lovely large corner room with views over the city and the Hofgarten park which is directly across the road from the hotel. This is one of the only hotels I have come across where they don't charge for an extra bed to be placed in the room for children. We were also lucky to get a parking space at the hotel free of charge. The room was beautifully furnished and very spacious. The breakfast although a tad expensive (but usual for this type of hotel) was very nice. The buffet was extremely well presented and food incredibly fresh and tasty. We also had dinner in the restaurant and ordered room service for the children's dinner. Again they were very accommodating. The location is superb as it's walking distance (10mins) to the centre of the city and to the main shopping precinct. The park across the road is very pretty and had a fantastic play area for the children. Most of the staff we dealt with were friendly and obliging.
reviews.title: Stylish hotel and great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was a great hotel with lovely rooms and a great bar! Not exactly in the city centre but close enough and a nice walk through a park to get there! The staff were very friendly and the room was big even though it was there standard room, would recommend this to anyone staying in Dusseldorf
reviews.title: Superb Hotel!!
Modern, Clean, Comfortable – highly recommended
reviews.text: A friend and I stayed in this hotel for one night on our way through Dusseldorf and had a very positive experience. The rooms were very clean, modern, and comfortable, with all the amenities one would expect from a modern hotel. The size of the room was also quite comfortable.

My only negative comment is to do with the hotel restaurant, which I would suggest skipping. Since we arrived too late to go out for dinner we ended up eating in the hotel and were less than impressed. The food was beautifully prepared, but only came in two flavors: bland or over-salted.
reviews.title: fab new hotel great staff,highly recomend.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would definitely recommend the hotel, but find somewhere else to eat.
reviews.title: Fantastic
Nice hotel
reviews.text: Hotel was very good, just opened, nice lounge bar, good breakfast buffet. Staff was very friendly and helpfull. Although the beds were very comfortable, we didn't sleep that good, because it was very very hot in the room, even with the heating switched off, and the air in the room was very dry.

This is a new hotel at entrance to a large park. The rooms are nice and modern with the amenities you'd expect in a hotel of this price. The front desk staff spoke the least English of any business hotel I have stayed at in Germany and we had trouble getting both the rate established, the number of people in the room, and whether breakfast was included for one or two people. In the end they added 20 euros a day to the bill for the second breakfast, but they did not tell us they were doing this until our last day. Also they have no computers for their business center yet.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, disappointing front desk staff
Good stay
reviews.text: All in all a good hotel and a great location, but eat elsewhere and hope you don't have to deal with the front desk staff.
Be sure to ask for a room away from the main street as trolley runs all night and is noisy.
reviews.title: just average

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Amazing hotel in a perfect location. Like the other reviews say breakfast is absolutely out of this world! We got it for 10 euros because we joined their 'loyalty scheme' which cost nothing to join, but gets you half price breakfasts, a newspaper and a free tapas dish in the bar. They will offer you this on check in.
reviews.title: book it, book it NOW!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms are small but perfectly formed, really nice design. Very comfy bed! Great bathroom with nice shampoos etc. TV only has 1 English channel (BBC Wrold News). You will also find a 'pillow menu' at the side of the bed from which you can pick from various different pillows which you can order from reception.
reviews.title: Perfect for weekend break

reviews.text: Walk to Altstadt takes 5 - 10 mins through the park, which is lit at night but the hotel is also around the corner from Nordstrasse Metro, only 1 stop away from the Atlstadt. Late at night just jump in a taxi back, it is less than 5 euros and there are always plenty around.
reviews.title: Excellent location close to "Kö"

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I absolutely recommend this hotel its well worth the money!
reviews.title: Melia Düsseldorf you will love it

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Only spent one night at the Melia as a surprise trip for my girlfriend. Perfectly located, close to the city center but in a quiet area next to a park. Rooms are brand new and very comfortable. Did not use any of the facilities at the hotel, but these looked very good as well. Would definetly recommend for a short city break. Also compliments for the guest experience manager, who put a welcome note and surprise in our room (as this was our anniversary weekend). Well done!
reviews.title: Best hotel in Dusseldorf

reviews.text: The rather new hotel (opened in October 2009) is a great find. Centrally located in a quiet residential street bordering the gorgeous Hofgarten park, it is just a 10 to 15 min. stroll through the park to Old Town and the Rhine promenade. For those not interested in walking: a tramway and subway stop is right around the corner.
reviews.title: Best Breakfast Ever
Nice Hotel
reviews.text: Rooms and public spaces are very nicely designed and the hotel's art concept reflects the park from across the street.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room was not especially large, but it was so smartly designed, with lots of shelves and storage space, that it never felt cramped. Beds were great, nice bath amenities were provided, the walk-in shower had nice water pressure and did not - as it happens so often - cause a flood on the bathroom floor. The room, though facing the street, was absolutely quiet.
reviews.title: Truly an amazing stay......we will definately be back

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Each guest received a voucher for a free tapa sample at the very hip bar/lounge. As member of Melia's MAS rewards, a newspaper was delivered to the room each morning free of charge.
reviews.title: Very Very GOOD

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staff was very nice and courteous throughout, and let us check-in very early (around 10 a. m) and check-out late (2 p. m.) without any hassle.
reviews.title: Modern hotel with good location, friendly and professional staff
